recipesJson.name: Turn Me Over
recipesJson.author: Dezy
recipesJson.description:
A lemon turnover pastry topped off with a light sprinkle of powered sugar. 

Finalized!

reviews.text: This gets rave reviews from my son's friends. They loved a lemon pound cake commercial juice. I saw your post on the FB page when you finalized this and mixed it out of curiosity. I gave a tester to one young man, who came back for more. Another tried it and now raves about it. You have a winner here. Thank you!
